title: Family finance: How Reddy should invest his idle surplus, secure risks - Economic Times
content: Family finance: How Reddy should invest his idle surplus, secure risks  Economic Times
description: Financial Planner Pankaaj Maalde suggests that Reddy first repay his Rs 5 lakh loan after selling land worth Rs 10 lakh. The remaining amount can be used to build an emergency corpus of Rs 4.56 lakh, which is equal to six months expenses.
